00045 
00046 ImportanceDensity::ImportanceDensity(Signal *signal, SHModel *model, Real angleThreshold)
00047 {
00048     assert(model);
00049 
00050     m_signal         = signal;
00051     m_model          = model;
00052     m_angleThreshold = angleThreshold / 2.0;
00053     m_2PI            = 2.0 * M_PI;
00054     m_log4PI         = std::log(4.0 * M_PI);
00055 }
00056 
00057 Direction ImportanceDensity::computeMeanDirection(Point xk, Direction ukm1)
00058 {
00059     std::vector<Direction> maxima = m_model->getMaxDirectionsAt(xk);
00060 
00061     if(maxima.size() > 1)
00062     {
00063         Vector vkm1 = ukm1.toVector();
00064         std::vector<Direction> mus;
00065         std::vector<Real> values;
00066         Real sum = 0;
00067 
00068         // we keep only maxima in the solid angle
00069         for(std::vector<Direction>::iterator it=maxima.begin(); it!=maxima.end(); it++)
00070         {
00071             Vector v = it->toVector();
00072 
00073             Real scalProd = v.x()*vkm1.x() + v.y()*vkm1.y() + v.z()*vkm1.z();
00074             Real normU    = v.x()*v.x() + v.y()*v.y() + v.z()*v.z();
00075             Real normV    = vkm1.x()*vkm1.x() + vkm1.y()*vkm1.y() + vkm1.z()*vkm1.z();
00076             Real alpha    = std::acos( scalProd / std::sqrt(normU * normV) );
00077 
00078             if(alpha <= m_angleThreshold)
00079             {
00080                 mus.push_back(*it);
00081                 values.push_back(m_model->odfAt(*it, xk));
00082                 sum += values.back();
00083             }
00084         } // for each maxima
00085 
00086         if(mus.size() > 1)
00087         {
00088             // simulate x~U(0,1)
00089             Real x = ((Real)std::rand() / (Real)RAND_MAX) * sum;
00090 
00091             // compare to intervals and choose the mean direction
00092             bool found = false;
00093             unsigned int i = 0;
00094             Real interval = 0;
00095 
00096             while(!found && i<values.size())
00097             {
00098                 interval += values[i];
00099 
00100                 if(x < interval)
00101                     found = true;
00102                 else
00103                     i++;
00104             }
00105 
00106             return mus[i];
00107         }
00108         else if(mus.size() == 1)
00109             return mus.front();
00110         else // mus.size() == 0
00111         {
00112 //            return ukm1;
00113             Direction nullDir;
00114             nullDir.setNull();
00115 
00116             return nullDir;
00117         }
00118     }
00119     else if(maxima.size() == 1)
00120         return maxima.front();
00121     else // maxima.size() == 0
00122     {
00123 //        return ukm1;
00124         Direction nullDir;
00125         nullDir.setNull();
00126 
00127         return nullDir;
00128     }
00129 }
00130 
00131 Direction ImportanceDensity::simulate(Direction mean, Real kappa)
00132 {
00133     Vector X;
00134 
00135     do
00136     {
00137         // Sample random scalar
00138         Real y = (Real)std::rand() / (Real)RAND_MAX;
00139         Real w = 1.0/kappa * std::log(std::exp(-kappa) + kappa * 2.0/kappa * std::sinh(kappa) * y);
00140 
00141         // Sample random angle (to get random unit vector)
00142         Real angle = ((Real)std::rand() / (Real)RAND_MAX) * m_2PI;
00143 
00144         // Concatenate to obtain unit vector with vmf distribution with mean = (0,0,1)
00145         Real cst = std::sqrt(1-w*w);
00146         X = Vector(cst*std::cos(angle), cst*std::sin(angle), w);
00147     } while(X.toDirection().theta() > m_angleThreshold);
00148 
00149     Real theta, phi;
00150     Vector vmean = mean.toVector();
00151 
00152     // Rotate if necessary
00153     if(!(vmean.x() == 0 && vmean.y() == 0 && vmean.z() == 1)) // mean not (0,0,1)
00154     {
00155         // Rotations from (0,0,1) to mean
00156         Real cosTheta = std::cos(mean.theta());
00157         Real sinTheta = std::sin(mean.theta());
00158         Real cosPhi   = std::cos(mean.phi());
00159         Real sinPhi   = std::sin(mean.phi());
00160 
00161         // Ry(theta)
00162         // | cos(theta)  0  sin(theta)  |   |x|
00163         // |     0       1       0      | . |y|
00164         // |-sin(theta)  0   cos(theta) |   |z|
00165         Vector tmp(
00166                 cosTheta * X.x() + sinTheta * X.z(),
00167                 X.y(),
00168                 -sinTheta * X.x() + cosTheta * X.z()
00169         );
00170 
00171         // Rz(phi)
00172         // | cos(phi)  -sin(phi)  0 |   |x|
00173         // | sin(phi)   cos(phi)  0 | . |y|
00174         // |    0          0      1 |   |z|
00175         Vector tmp2(
00176                 cosPhi * tmp.x() - sinPhi * tmp.y(),
00177                 sinPhi * tmp.x() + cosPhi * tmp.y(),
00178                 tmp.z()
00179         );
00180 
00181         theta = tmp2.toSphericalCoordinates().theta();
00182         phi   = tmp2.toSphericalCoordinates().phi();
00183     }
00184     else // vkm1 is (0,0,1)
00185     {
00186         theta = X.toSphericalCoordinates().theta();
00187         phi   = X.toSphericalCoordinates().phi();
00188     }
00189 
00190     return Direction(theta,phi);
00191 }
00192 
00193 Real ImportanceDensity::compute(Direction uk, Direction mean, Real kappa)
00194 {
00195     Vector vk   = uk.toVector();
00196     Vector vmean = mean.toVector();
00197 
00198     return std::log(kappa) - m_log4PI - std::log(std::sinh(kappa)) + kappa * (vk.x()*vmean.x() + vk.y()*vmean.y() + vk.z()*vmean.z());
00199 }
00200 
00201 Real ImportanceDensity::computeConcentration(Direction mu, Point xk)
00202 {
00203     Matrix S = m_signal->signalAt(xk);
00204     Matrix M = m_model->signalAt(xk);
00205 
00206     Vector vmu = mu.toVector();
00207     std::vector<Direction> *directions = m_signal->getDirections();
00208 
00209     Real sumSquare = 0;
00210     Real min = MAX_REAL, max = MIN_REAL;
00211     unsigned int n = 0;
00212 
00213     for(unsigned int g=0; g<S.Rows(); g++)
00214     {
00215         Vector vg = directions->at(g).toVector();
00216 
00217         Real scalarProduct = vg.x()*vmu.x() + vg.y()*vmu.y() + vg.z()*vmu.z();
00218         Real normVG        = vg.x()*vg.x() + vg.y()*vg.y() + vg.z()*vg.z();
00219         Real normVMU       = vmu.x()*vmu.x() + vmu.y()*vmu.y() + vmu.z()*vmu.z();
00220         Real angle         = std::acos( scalarProduct / std::sqrt(normVG * normVMU) );
00221 
00222         if(angle <= m_angleThreshold)
00223         {
00224             Real diff = M(g,0) - S(g,0);
00225             sumSquare += diff*diff;
00226 
00227             if(min > M(g,0))
00228                 min = M(g,0);
00229 
00230             if(min > S(g,0))
00231                 min = S(g,0);
00232 
00233             if(max < M(g,0))
00234                 max = M(g,0);
00235 
00236             if(max < S(g,0))
00237                 max = S(g,0);
00238 
00239             n++;
00240         }
00241     }
00242 
00243 
00244     Real nrmse = std::sqrt(sumSquare / n) / (max - min);
00245     Real kappa = (nrmse > 0.3) ? 10 : 435.1455649013809 * std::exp(-25.74351897609373 * nrmse + 44.9437993453943 * nrmse*nrmse);
00246 
00247     return (kappa <= 200) ? kappa : 200;
00248 }
